David De Gea breaks silence after Edoardo Bove collapse as Fiorentina vs Inter abandoned
========================================================================================

David De Gea responds to Edoardo Bove collapse with online message after horrific Fiorentina vs Inter clash
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Fiorentina and Inter players react after Edoardo Bove collapse](https://i2-prod.football.london/incoming/article30492914.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_edoardo-bove-fiorentina-inter.jpg)

David De Gea was playing as Edoardo Bove collapsed for Fiorentina during Inter match (Image: Image Photo Agency/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Former Manchester United goalkeeper David De Gea has sent hopeful prayers the way of his Fiorentina teammate Edoardo Bove after he collapsed during Sunday's match against Inter. The game was suspended after 25 minutes with Bove stretchered off and taken to hospital.

De Gea, who joined the Italian side over the summer and has played 10 times in Serie A alongside Bove, started the game. [He was among those who were extremely worried on the field after Bove fell to the ground.](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/fiorentina-vs-inter-suspended-david-30492772)

Writing on X (formerly Twitter), De Gea said, "God Please (prayer hands emoji\]". Players were taken from the pitch by the referee after Bove was removed from the stadium.

A group of medical staff and members of both teams formed a wall to block any view of Bove during the distressing incident. Some were left in tears and putting their hands on their head and over their eyes.

It has been reported in Italy that Bove is breathing on his own in hospital. The game has since been abandoned and will be rescheduled.

Bove, 22, is on loan from Roma and joined Fiorentina over the summer like De Gea. The ex-United shot-stopper moved to Italy as a free agent after not finding a club upon his exit from [Old Trafford](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/old-trafford).

The Serie A X account also posted a message to Bove. It wrote: "Forza Edo. Siamo con te!" alongside an image of the player. It translates to: "Come on Edo. We are with you!"

Fellow ex-Manchester United star Paul Pogba was among others to offer their support. "Forza @edo\_bove \[prayer hands emoji\]" he wrote on his Instagram story with a blank background. Former [Manchester City](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-city-fc) striker Mario Balotelli did the same. He wrote: "@edo\_bove Prego di rivederti così al più presto Ti abbraccio forte \[bicep emoji\]", which translates as, "I pray to see you again as soon as possible I hug you tightly."

Romelu Lukaku and Tammy Abraham, who were both at Roma last season but now play at Napoli and AC Milan respectively, have also posted to their Instagram stories for Bove.

Bove has played 11 league games for La Viola this season, winning the last seven he has started alongside De Gea. The pair have only failed to win twice when playing together, only one was a defeat.

David De Gea breaks silence after Edoardo Bove collapse as Fiorentina vs Inter abandoned
========================================================================================

David De Gea responds to Edoardo Bove collapse with online message after horrific Fiorentina vs Inter clash
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Fiorentina and Inter players react after Edoardo Bove collapse](https://i2-prod.football.london/incoming/article30492914.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_edoardo-bove-fiorentina-inter.jpg)

David De Gea was playing as Edoardo Bove collapsed for Fiorentina during Inter match (Image: Image Photo Agency/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Former Manchester United goalkeeper David De Gea has sent hopeful prayers the way of his Fiorentina teammate Edoardo Bove after he collapsed during Sunday's match against Inter. The game was suspended after 25 minutes with Bove stretchered off and taken to hospital.

De Gea, who joined the Italian side over the summer and has played 10 times in Serie A alongside Bove, started the game. [He was among those who were extremely worried on the field after Bove fell to the ground.](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/fiorentina-vs-inter-suspended-david-30492772)

Writing on X (formerly Twitter), De Gea said, "God Please (prayer hands emoji\]". Players were taken from the pitch by the referee after Bove was removed from the stadium.

A group of medical staff and members of both teams formed a wall to block any view of Bove during the distressing incident. Some were left in tears and putting their hands on their head and over their eyes.

It has been reported in Italy that Bove is breathing on his own in hospital. The game has since been abandoned and will be rescheduled.

Bove, 22, is on loan from Roma and joined Fiorentina over the summer like De Gea. The ex-United shot-stopper moved to Italy as a free agent after not finding a club upon his exit from [Old Trafford](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/old-trafford).

The Serie A X account also posted a message to Bove. It wrote: "Forza Edo. Siamo con te!" alongside an image of the player. It translates to: "Come on Edo. We are with you!"

Fellow ex-Manchester United star Paul Pogba was among others to offer their support. "Forza @edo\_bove \[prayer hands emoji\]" he wrote on his Instagram story with a blank background. Former [Manchester City](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-city-fc) striker Mario Balotelli did the same. He wrote: "@edo\_bove Prego di rivederti così al più presto Ti abbraccio forte \[bicep emoji\]", which translates as, "I pray to see you again as soon as possible I hug you tightly."

Romelu Lukaku and Tammy Abraham, who were both at Roma last season but now play at Napoli and AC Milan respectively, have also posted to their Instagram stories for Bove.

Bove has played 11 league games for La Viola this season, winning the last seven he has started alongside De Gea. The pair have only failed to win twice when playing together, only one was a defeat.

Ruben Amorim makes Marcus Rashford claim after Manchester United win
====================================================================

Marcus Rashford scored twice in Man Utd's comfortable win over Everton and Ruben Amorim was asked about his display.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Share

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Steven Railston](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/steven-railston/)Manchester United Writer

*   17:11, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated17:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30491402.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187193341.jpg)

Rashford scored a brace.

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Ruben Amorim agreed Marcus Rashford showed "he wanted it" by scoring a brace in Manchester United's dominant 4-0 victory over Everton on Sunday.

Amorim said when asked about Rashford at his press conference last week: "We'll try to find the right solution for him but he has to be Marcus, first of all, to try to return to that moment."

He added that Rashford "has to be the first one to want it" and the United academy graduate responded to that challenge by scoring an impressive brace against Everton.

Rashford scored the first goal of Amorim's tenure when finding the net after just 81 seconds against Ipswich Town at Portman Road and now has seven goals in all competitions.

**ALSO READ: [United player ratings from Everton fixture](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**ALSO READ:** **[Ratcliffe must make a U-turn after United price hike](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/kick-teeth-sir-jim-ratcliffe-30475527)**

Amorim was asked whether Rashford's performance against Everton was an example of him "wanting it" and responded: "Yeah, yeah... he can do so much. He has to continue to improve.

"He has the ability to do that but he can play so much better, like the other guys. It was a good performance, tomorrow he has to recover and start thinking about Arsenal."

Zirkzee also scored twice on Sunday and Amorim discussed his display. "First thing, I need all the players to cope with all the games and he’s one of them. I just try to put my players in good positions for their characteristics," he said.

"It would have been really hard, even for Rasmus \[Hojlund\], to fight with the two centre-backs of Everton, so we try and push them to a position that they weren’t so comfortable and Josh did a great job.

"He scored two goals, which is always important for the confidence. But more important than that was his performance because he fought in every situation. It was a good day for him and our team."

United's win against Everton moved them into the top half of the table. "I understand that it’s hard for me to say no because you would say I can’t be a [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) coach, but I want to be honest with our fans," said Amorim about potential [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) qualification.

"So let’s focus on the performance and not the results. We’ll see in the end. I’ve said this many times, I will be judged on where we finish, I know that, but let’s focus on the next game and look at the performance.

"On Thursday, it was a 3-2 and I think we deserved more. Today was 4-0 but I thought Everton deserved more. Let’s focus on the performance, congratulations to the lads, let’s rest, recover and think about Arsenal."

Ruben Amorim agreed Marcus Rashford showed "he wanted it" by scoring a brace in Manchester United's dominant 4-0 victory over Everton on Sunday.

Amorim said when asked about Rashford at his press conference last week: "We'll try to find the right solution for him but he has to be Marcus, first of all, to try to return to that moment."

He added that Rashford "has to be the first one to want it" and the United academy graduate responded to that challenge by scoring an impressive brace against Everton.

Rashford scored the first goal of Amorim's tenure when finding the net after just 81 seconds against Ipswich Town at Portman Road and now has seven goals in all competitions.

**ALSO READ: [United player ratings from Everton fixture](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**ALSO READ:** **[Ratcliffe must make a U-turn after United price hike](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/kick-teeth-sir-jim-ratcliffe-30475527)**

Amorim was asked whether Rashford's performance against Everton was an example of him "wanting it" and responded: "Yeah, yeah... he can do so much. He has to continue to improve.

"He has the ability to do that but he can play so much better, like the other guys. It was a good performance, tomorrow he has to recover and start thinking about Arsenal."

Zirkzee also scored twice on Sunday and Amorim discussed his display. "First thing, I need all the players to cope with all the games and he’s one of them. I just try to put my players in good positions for their characteristics," he said.

"It would have been really hard, even for Rasmus \[Hojlund\], to fight with the two centre-backs of Everton, so we try and push them to a position that they weren’t so comfortable and Josh did a great job.

"He scored two goals, which is always important for the confidence. But more important than that was his performance because he fought in every situation. It was a good day for him and our team."

United's win against Everton moved them into the top half of the table. "I understand that it’s hard for me to say no because you would say I can’t be a [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) coach, but I want to be honest with our fans," said Amorim about potential [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) qualification.

"So let’s focus on the performance and not the results. We’ll see in the end. I’ve said this many times, I will be judged on where we finish, I know that, but let’s focus on the next game and look at the performance.

"On Thursday, it was a 3-2 and I think we deserved more. Today was 4-0 but I thought Everton deserved more. Let’s focus on the performance, congratulations to the lads, let’s rest, recover and think about Arsenal."

data: {"title":"Ruben Amorim makes Marcus Rashford claim after Manchester United win","description":"Marcus Rashford scored twice in Man Utd's comfortable win over Everton and Ruben Amorim was asked about his display.","url":"https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/ruben-amorim-makes-marcus-rashford-30492463","content":"Ruben Amorim makes Marcus Rashford claim after Manchester United win - Manchester Evening News
===============
                                   

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Ruben Amorim makes Marcus Rashford claim after Manchester United win
====================================================================

Marcus Rashford scored twice in Man Utd's comfortable win over Everton and Ruben Amorim was asked about his display.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

*   [Comments](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/ruben-amorim-makes-marcus-rashford-30492463#comments-wrapper "Comments")

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Steven Railston](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/steven-railston/)Manchester United Writer

*   17:11, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated17:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30491402.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187193341.jpg)

Rashford scored a brace.

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Ruben Amorim agreed Marcus Rashford showed "he wanted it" by scoring a brace in Manchester United's dominant 4-0 victory over Everton on Sunday.

Amorim said when asked about Rashford at his press conference last week: "We'll try to find the right solution for him but he has to be Marcus, first of all, to try to return to that moment."

He added that Rashford "has to be the first one to want it" and the United academy graduate responded to that challenge by scoring an impressive brace against Everton.

Rashford scored the first goal of Amorim's tenure when finding the net after just 81 seconds against Ipswich Town at Portman Road and now has seven goals in all competitions.

**ALSO READ: [United player ratings from Everton fixture](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**ALSO READ:** **[Ratcliffe must make a U-turn after United price hike](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/kick-teeth-sir-jim-ratcliffe-30475527)**

Amorim was asked whether Rashford's performance against Everton was an example of him "wanting it" and responded: "Yeah, yeah... he can do so much. He has to continue to improve.

"He has the ability to do that but he can play so much better, like the other guys. It was a good performance, tomorrow he has to recover and start thinking about Arsenal."

Zirkzee also scored twice on Sunday and Amorim discussed his display. "First thing, I need all the players to cope with all the games and he’s one of them. I just try to put my players in good positions for their characteristics," he said.

"It would have been really hard, even for Rasmus \[Hojlund\], to fight with the two centre-backs of Everton, so we try and push them to a position that they weren’t so comfortable and Josh did a great job.

"He scored two goals, which is always important for the confidence. But more important than that was his performance because he fought in every situation. It was a good day for him and our team."

United's win against Everton moved them into the top half of the table. "I understand that it’s hard for me to say no because you would say I can’t be a [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) coach, but I want to be honest with our fans," said Amorim about potential [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) qualification.

"So let’s focus on the performance and not the results. We’ll see in the end. I’ve said this many times, I will be judged on where we finish, I know that, but let’s focus on the next game and look at the performance.

"On Thursday, it was a 3-2 and I think we deserved more. Today was 4-0 but I thought Everton deserved more. Let’s focus on the performance, congratulations to the lads, let’s rest, recover and think about Arsenal."

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Ruben Amorim makes Marcus Rashford claim after Manchester United win
====================================================================

Marcus Rashford scored twice in Man Utd's comfortable win over Everton and Ruben Amorim was asked about his display.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

*   [Comments](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/ruben-amorim-makes-marcus-rashford-30492463#comments-wrapper "Comments")

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Steven Railston](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/steven-railston/)Manchester United Writer

*   17:11, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated17:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30491402.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187193341.jpg)

Rashford scored a brace.

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Ruben Amorim agreed Marcus Rashford showed "he wanted it" by scoring a brace in Manchester United's dominant 4-0 victory over Everton on Sunday.

Amorim said when asked about Rashford at his press conference last week: "We'll try to find the right solution for him but he has to be Marcus, first of all, to try to return to that moment."

Amorim was asked whether Rashford's performance against Everton was an example of him "wanting it" and responded: "Yeah, yeah... he can do so much. He has to continue to improve.

"He has the ability to do that but he can play so much better, like the other guys. It was a good performance, tomorrow he has to recover and start thinking about Arsenal."

Zirkzee also scored twice on Sunday and Amorim discussed his display. "First thing, I need all the players to cope with all the games and he’s one of them. I just try to put my players in good positions for their characteristics," he said.

"It would have been really hard, even for Rasmus \[Hojlund\], to fight with the two centre-backs of Everton, so we try and push them to a position that they weren’t so comfortable and Josh did a great job.

"He scored two goals, which is always important for the confidence. But more important than that was his performance because he fought in every situation. It was a good day for him and our team."

United's win against Everton moved them into the top half of the table. "I understand that it’s hard for me to say no because you would say I can’t be a [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) coach, but I want to be honest with our fans," said Amorim about potential [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) qualification.

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Ruben Amorim makes Marcus Rashford claim after Manchester United win
====================================================================

Marcus Rashford scored twice in Man Utd's comfortable win over Everton and Ruben Amorim was asked about his display.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

*   [Comments](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/ruben-amorim-makes-marcus-rashford-30492463#comments-wrapper "Comments")

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Steven Railston](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/steven-railston/)Manchester United Writer

*   17:11, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated17:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30491402.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187193341.jpg)

Rashford scored a brace.

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Ruben Amorim agreed Marcus Rashford showed "he wanted it" by scoring a brace in Manchester United's dominant 4-0 victory over Everton on Sunday.

Amorim said when asked about Rashford at his press conference last week: "We'll try to find the right solution for him but he has to be Marcus, first of all, to try to return to that moment."

He added that Rashford "has to be the first one to want it" and the United academy graduate responded to that challenge by scoring an impressive brace against Everton.

Rashford scored the first goal of Amorim's tenure when finding the net after just 81 seconds against Ipswich Town at Portman Road and now has seven goals in all competitions.

Amorim was asked whether Rashford's performance against Everton was an example of him "wanting it" and responded: "Yeah, yeah... he can do so much. He has to continue to improve.

"He has the ability to do that but he can play so much better, like the other guys. It was a good performance, tomorrow he has to recover and start thinking about Arsenal."

Zirkzee also scored twice on Sunday and Amorim discussed his display. "First thing, I need all the players to cope with all the games and he’s one of them. I just try to put my players in good positions for their characteristics," he said.

"It would have been really hard, even for Rasmus \[Hojlund\], to fight with the two centre-backs of Everton, so we try and push them to a position that they weren’t so comfortable and Josh did a great job.

"He scored two goals, which is always important for the confidence. But more important than that was his performance because he fought in every situation. It was a good day for him and our team."

United's win against Everton moved them into the top half of the table. "I understand that it’s hard for me to say no because you would say I can’t be a [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) coach, but I want to be honest with our fans," said Amorim about potential [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) qualification.

Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses
=============================================================================

Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Tom Coley](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/tom-coley/)

*   17:46, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated18:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/article30492769.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_JS353306878.jpg)

Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff (Image: Gabriele Maltinti/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

David De Gea was among the Fiorentina players left worried after teammate Edoardo Bove collapsed on the field just 15 minutes into a Serie A match against Inter on Sunday. The former [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) goalkeeper started the match before it had to be suspended.

Bove, 22, fell to the ground early on with players and medical staff rushing to his aid. A wall of bodies was formed to protect the Italian from being visible.

Play was officially stopped by the referee 10 minutes after Bove went down. Some of those on the field were left in tears at the disturbing scenes.

Bove was taken to hospital after being stretched off the field, lead directly into a pitchside ambulance. Both sets of players went down the tunnel shortly after with play being cut short.

It is reported that the player bent down to tie his laces before collapsing. Nobody is said to have been around him when it happened.

Inter posted online to signal that the game had been suspended due to a medical emergency. No official statement from the league has been issued as of yet, although the Serie A X(formerly Twitter) account wrote, "Forza Edo. Siamo con te!" alongside an image of Bove. It translates to: "Come on Edo. We are with you!"

De Gea also sent a message to Bove. He wrote on X, "God Please \[prayer hands emoji\]".

The young midfielder is on loan from Roma and has played 11 league games for Fiorentina this season. 10 of those have featured De Gea after he was picked up on a free contract earlier this year following his departure from Manchester United.

Fiorentina have won eight of the games with De Gea and Bove on the pitch, losing the first and drawing another. The pair have been victorious in each of their previous seven heading into the match with Inter.

data: {"title":"Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses","description":"Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing","url":"https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/fiorentina-vs-inter-suspended-david-30492772","content":"Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses - Manchester Evening News
===============
                                   

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses
=============================================================================

Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Tom Coley](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/tom-coley/)

*   17:46, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated18:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/article30492769.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_JS353306878.jpg)

Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff (Image: Gabriele Maltinti/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

David De Gea was among the Fiorentina players left worried after teammate Edoardo Bove collapsed on the field just 15 minutes into a Serie A match against Inter on Sunday. The former [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) goalkeeper started the match before it had to be suspended.

Bove, 22, fell to the ground early on with players and medical staff rushing to his aid. A wall of bodies was formed to protect the Italian from being visible.

Play was officially stopped by the referee 10 minutes after Bove went down. Some of those on the field were left in tears at the disturbing scenes.

Bove was taken to hospital after being stretched off the field, lead directly into a pitchside ambulance. Both sets of players went down the tunnel shortly after with play being cut short.

It is reported that the player bent down to tie his laces before collapsing. Nobody is said to have been around him when it happened.

Inter posted online to signal that the game had been suspended due to a medical emergency. No official statement from the league has been issued as of yet, although the Serie A X(formerly Twitter) account wrote, "Forza Edo. Siamo con te!" alongside an image of Bove. It translates to: "Come on Edo. We are with you!"

De Gea also sent a message to Bove. He wrote on X, "God Please \[prayer hands emoji\]".

The young midfielder is on loan from Roma and has played 11 league games for Fiorentina this season. 10 of those have featured De Gea after he was picked up on a free contract earlier this year following his departure from Manchester United.

Fiorentina have won eight of the games with De Gea and Bove on the pitch, losing the first and drawing another. The pair have been victorious in each of their previous seven heading into the match with Inter.

data: {"title":"Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses","description":"Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing","url":"https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/fiorentina-vs-inter-suspended-david-30492772","content":"Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses - Manchester Evening News
===============
                                   

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses
=============================================================================

Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Tom Coley](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/tom-coley/)

*   17:46, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated18:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/article30492769.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_JS353306878.jpg)

Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff (Image: Gabriele Maltinti/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

David De Gea was among the Fiorentina players left worried after teammate Edoardo Bove collapsed on the field just 15 minutes into a Serie A match against Inter on Sunday. The former [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) goalkeeper started the match before it had to be suspended.

Bove, 22, fell to the ground early on with players and medical staff rushing to his aid. A wall of bodies was formed to protect the Italian from being visible.

Play was officially stopped by the referee 10 minutes after Bove went down. Some of those on the field were left in tears at the disturbing scenes.

Bove was taken to hospital after being stretched off the field, lead directly into a pitchside ambulance. Both sets of players went down the tunnel shortly after with play being cut short.

It is reported that the player bent down to tie his laces before collapsing. Nobody is said to have been around him when it happened.

Inter posted online to signal that the game had been suspended due to a medical emergency. No official statement from the league has been issued as of yet, although the Serie A X(formerly Twitter) account wrote, "Forza Edo. Siamo con te!" alongside an image of Bove. It translates to: "Come on Edo. We are with you!"

De Gea also sent a message to Bove. He wrote on X, "God Please \[prayer hands emoji\]".

The young midfielder is on loan from Roma and has played 11 league games for Fiorentina this season. 10 of those have featured De Gea after he was picked up on a free contract earlier this year following his departure from Manchester United.

Fiorentina have won eight of the games with De Gea and Bove on the pitch, losing the first and drawing another. The pair have been victorious in each of their previous seven heading into the match with Inter.

data: {"title":"Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses","description":"Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing","url":"https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/fiorentina-vs-inter-suspended-david-30492772","content":"Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses - Manchester Evening News
===============
                                     

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Fiorentina vs Inter suspended as David de Gea teammate Edoardo Bove collapses
=============================================================================

Former Manchester United goalkeeper was playing as his Fiorentina side saw their match with Inter suspended following Edoardo Bove collapsing
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Tom Coley](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/tom-coley/)

*   17:46, 1 DEC 2024
*   Updated18:15, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/article30492769.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_JS353306878.jpg)

Edoardo Bove of ACF Fiorentina is put into an ambulance by medical staff (Image: Gabriele Maltinti/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

David De Gea was among the Fiorentina players left worried after teammate Edoardo Bove collapsed on the field just 15 minutes into a Serie A match against Inter on Sunday. The former [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) goalkeeper started the match before it had to be suspended.

Bove, 22, fell to the ground early on with players and medical staff rushing to his aid. A wall of bodies was formed to protect the Italian from being visible.

Play was officially stopped by the referee 10 minutes after Bove went down. Some of those on the field were left in tears at the disturbing scenes.

Bove was taken to hospital after being stretched off the field, lead directly into a pitchside ambulance. Both sets of players went down the tunnel shortly after with play being cut short.

It is reported that the player bent down to tie his laces before collapsing. Nobody is said to have been around him when it happened.

Inter posted online to signal that the game had been suspended due to a medical emergency. No official statement from the league has been issued as of yet, although the Serie A X(formerly Twitter) account wrote, "Forza Edo. Siamo con te!" alongside an image of Bove. It translates to: "Come on Edo. We are with you!"

De Gea also sent a message to Bove. He wrote on X, "God Please \[prayer hands emoji\]".

The young midfielder is on loan from Roma and has played 11 league games for Fiorentina this season. 10 of those have featured De Gea after he was picked up on a free contract earlier this year following his departure from Manchester United.

Fiorentina have won eight of the games with De Gea and Bove on the pitch, losing the first and drawing another. The pair have been victorious in each of their previous seven heading into the match with Inter.

Amad sends eight-word Man United message after Ruben Amorim makes Ruud van Nistelrooy comment
=============================================================================================

Amad Diallo excelled for Manchester United against Everton, as he was involved in every goal and notched two assists during their thumping 4-0 victory at Old Trafford
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

By

[Kieran King](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/kieran-king/)Football Writer

*   18:24, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492467.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_Amad-Diallo-2.jpg)

Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton on Sunday (Image: Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

[Amad Diallo](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/amad-diallo) impressed for [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) during their 4-0 win over Everton at [Old Trafford](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/old-trafford). The Ivorian, who was handed another Premier League start by Ruben Amorim, grabbed two assists against the Toffees on Sunday.

After being involved in both of United's first two goals, Amad added his first assist just after half-time. He dribbled at the Everton back-line before feeding through Marcus Rashford, who slotted beyond Jordan Pickford.

It felt as though the 22-year-old started to go through the gears from that point and he produced another piece of magic to put United 4-0 ahead. Amad won the ball back inside the Everton half before sliding a pass into Joshua Zirkzee, who made no mistake and tucked home into the bottom corner.

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends clear message to Ruben Amorim after Man United demand](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends Arsenal warning ahead of Man United clash](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

After the game, Amad took to Instagram to send a message to the United supporters following the thumping win over Everton. He said in a caption: "We keep going," followed by a flexed biceps emoji. Thanks fans for the support," alongside a love heart emoji.

There is no doubt that Amad has improved this season and Amorim, who was appointed as the new United head coach on November 1, has since hailed Ruud van Nistelrooy for helping the winger. Van Nistelrooy won three of his four matches as interim head coach after the sacking of Erik ten Hag, but left his position on November 11 with Amorim deciding to recruit his own backroom staff.

Speaking in a post-match interview, Amorim told BBC's Match of the Day: "He is really big in talent, but small in size. He did a great job but he is also has to improve. He is a great moment. Ruud van Nistelrooy helped him a lot in his games in charge and now he's helping me."

The win for United has moved them up to ninth, four points off the [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) places. They have won five, drawn four and lost four of their 13 [Premier League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/premier-league) matches so far this season.

"It was far from a perfect performance," Amorim added. "We have to improve, you can feel that in the game. After 15 minutes Everton controlled the game and it was difficult for us and we were losing the second ball. I felt that the players could solve some problems that we have as a team because of the quality that they have but it was far from a perfect performance but a really good result and tough match."

Amad sends eight-word Man United message after Ruben Amorim makes Ruud van Nistelrooy comment
=============================================================================================

Amad Diallo excelled for Manchester United against Everton, as he was involved in every goal and notched two assists during their thumping 4-0 victory at Old Trafford
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492467.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_Amad-Diallo-2.jpg)

Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton on Sunday (Image: Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

[Amad Diallo](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/amad-diallo) impressed for [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) during their 4-0 win over Everton at [Old Trafford](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/old-trafford). The Ivorian, who was handed another Premier League start by Ruben Amorim, grabbed two assists against the Toffees on Sunday.

After being involved in both of United's first two goals, Amad added his first assist just after half-time. He dribbled at the Everton back-line before feeding through Marcus Rashford, who slotted beyond Jordan Pickford.

It felt as though the 22-year-old started to go through the gears from that point and he produced another piece of magic to put United 4-0 ahead. Amad won the ball back inside the Everton half before sliding a pass into Joshua Zirkzee, who made no mistake and tucked home into the bottom corner.

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends clear message to Ruben Amorim after Man United demand](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends Arsenal warning ahead of Man United clash](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

After the game, Amad took to Instagram to send a message to the United supporters following the thumping win over Everton. He said in a caption: "We keep going," followed by a flexed biceps emoji. Thanks fans for the support," alongside a love heart emoji.

There is no doubt that Amad has improved this season and Amorim, who was appointed as the new United head coach on November 1, has since hailed Ruud van Nistelrooy for helping the winger. Van Nistelrooy won three of his four matches as interim head coach after the sacking of Erik ten Hag, but left his position on November 11 with Amorim deciding to recruit his own backroom staff.

Speaking in a post-match interview, Amorim told BBC's Match of the Day: "He is really big in talent, but small in size. He did a great job but he is also has to improve. He is a great moment. Ruud van Nistelrooy helped him a lot in his games in charge and now he's helping me."

The win for United has moved them up to ninth, four points off the [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) places. They have won five, drawn four and lost four of their 13 [Premier League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/premier-league) matches so far this season.

"It was far from a perfect performance," Amorim added. "We have to improve, you can feel that in the game. After 15 minutes Everton controlled the game and it was difficult for us and we were losing the second ball. I felt that the players could solve some problems that we have as a team because of the quality that they have but it was far from a perfect performance but a really good result and tough match."

Amad sends eight-word Man United message after Ruben Amorim makes Ruud van Nistelrooy comment
=============================================================================================

Amad Diallo excelled for Manchester United against Everton, as he was involved in every goal and notched two assists during their thumping 4-0 victory at Old Trafford
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492467.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_Amad-Diallo-2.jpg)

Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton on Sunday (Image: Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

[Amad Diallo](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/amad-diallo) impressed for [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) during their 4-0 win over Everton at [Old Trafford](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/old-trafford). The Ivorian, who was handed another Premier League start by Ruben Amorim, grabbed two assists against the Toffees on Sunday.

After being involved in both of United's first two goals, Amad added his first assist just after half-time. He dribbled at the Everton back-line before feeding through Marcus Rashford, who slotted beyond Jordan Pickford.

It felt as though the 22-year-old started to go through the gears from that point and he produced another piece of magic to put United 4-0 ahead. Amad won the ball back inside the Everton half before sliding a pass into Joshua Zirkzee, who made no mistake and tucked home into the bottom corner.

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends clear message to Ruben Amorim after Man United demand](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends Arsenal warning ahead of Man United clash](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

After the game, Amad took to Instagram to send a message to the United supporters following the thumping win over Everton. He said in a caption: "We keep going," followed by a flexed biceps emoji. Thanks fans for the support," alongside a love heart emoji.

There is no doubt that Amad has improved this season and Amorim, who was appointed as the new United head coach on November 1, has since hailed Ruud van Nistelrooy for helping the winger. Van Nistelrooy won three of his four matches as interim head coach after the sacking of Erik ten Hag, but left his position on November 11 with Amorim deciding to recruit his own backroom staff.

Speaking in a post-match interview, Amorim told BBC's Match of the Day: "He is really big in talent, but small in size. He did a great job but he is also has to improve. He is a great moment. Ruud van Nistelrooy helped him a lot in his games in charge and now he's helping me."

The win for United has moved them up to ninth, four points off the [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) places. They have won five, drawn four and lost four of their 13 [Premier League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/premier-league) matches so far this season.

"It was far from a perfect performance," Amorim added. "We have to improve, you can feel that in the game. After 15 minutes Everton controlled the game and it was difficult for us and we were losing the second ball. I felt that the players could solve some problems that we have as a team because of the quality that they have but it was far from a perfect performance but a really good result and tough match."

===============
                                    

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Amad sends eight-word Man United message after Ruben Amorim makes Ruud van Nistelrooy comment
=============================================================================================

Amad Diallo excelled for Manchester United against Everton, as he was involved in every goal and notched two assists during their thumping 4-0 victory at Old Trafford
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

By

[Kieran King](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/kieran-king/)Football Writer

*   18:24, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492467.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_Amad-Diallo-2.jpg)

Amad Diallo impressed for Manchester United against Everton on Sunday (Image: Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

[Amad Diallo](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/amad-diallo) impressed for [Manchester United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) during their 4-0 win over Everton at [Old Trafford](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/old-trafford). The Ivorian, who was handed another Premier League start by Ruben Amorim, grabbed two assists against the Toffees on Sunday.

After being involved in both of United's first two goals, Amad added his first assist just after half-time. He dribbled at the Everton back-line before feeding through Marcus Rashford, who slotted beyond Jordan Pickford.

It felt as though the 22-year-old started to go through the gears from that point and he produced another piece of magic to put United 4-0 ahead. Amad won the ball back inside the Everton half before sliding a pass into Joshua Zirkzee, who made no mistake and tucked home into the bottom corner.

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends clear message to Ruben Amorim after Man United demand](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

**READ MORE: [Marcus Rashford sends Arsenal warning ahead of Man United clash](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/marcus-rashford-immediately-responds-ruben-30491674)**

After the game, Amad took to Instagram to send a message to the United supporters following the thumping win over Everton. He said in a caption: "We keep going," followed by a flexed biceps emoji. Thanks fans for the support," alongside a love heart emoji.

There is no doubt that Amad has improved this season and Amorim, who was appointed as the new United head coach on November 1, has since hailed Ruud van Nistelrooy for helping the winger. Van Nistelrooy won three of his four matches as interim head coach after the sacking of Erik ten Hag, but left his position on November 11 with Amorim deciding to recruit his own backroom staff.

Speaking in a post-match interview, Amorim told BBC's Match of the Day: "He is really big in talent, but small in size. He did a great job but he is also has to improve. He is a great moment. Ruud van Nistelrooy helped him a lot in his games in charge and now he's helping me."

The win for United has moved them up to ninth, four points off the [Champions League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/uefa-champions-league) places. They have won five, drawn four and lost four of their 13 [Premier League](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/premier-league) matches so far this season.

"It was far from a perfect performance," Amorim added. "We have to improve, you can feel that in the game. After 15 minutes Everton controlled the game and it was difficult for us and we were losing the second ball. I felt that the players could solve some problems that we have as a team because of the quality that they have but it was far from a perfect performance but a really good result and tough match."

Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton
===========================================================================

Manchester United recorded back-to-back victories on Sunday as they beat Everton 4-0 in the Premier League at Old Trafford
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Joshua Zirkzee celebrates scoring for Manchester United vs Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492643.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187703787.jpg)

Joshua Zirkzee celebrates scoring for Manchester United vs Everton on Sunday (Image: James Gill - Danehouse/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

Manchester United defenders Harry Maguire and Matthijs de Ligt have sent their appreciation to Joshua Zirkzee as his brace helped the Reds to a 4-0 victory over Everton.

[United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) opened the scoring just after the half-hour mark when [Marcus Rashford's](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/marcus-rashford) deflected strike beat Jordan Pickford. Shortly before the interval, Zirkzee had his first of the afternoon firing home on the edge of the area after Amad won the ball high up the pitch.

In the second half, Rashford netted his brace and [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) followed closely afterwards with a calm finish into the bottom corner. While it was good for United to see the English striker move on to seven for the season, it was particularly pleasing to see Zirkzee find his feet.

**READ MORE: [United player ratings vs Everton](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**READ MORE: [Amorim handed huge double blow ahead of Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/ruben-amorim-handed-huge-double-30491567)**

After being signed by [Erik ten Hag](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/erik-ten-hag) and not impressing in front of goal, there had been speculation that Zirkzee could be surplus to requirements so soon into his United career. But, getting a start under Amorim and scoring twice will undoubtedly boost his confidence.

Following the match both [De Ligt](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/matthijs-de-ligt) and [Maguire](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/harry-maguire) sent messages to the striker. His Dutch teammate posted a fire emoji alongside a picture of the pair celebrating to which [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) replied with a love heart.

Meanwhile, Maguire wrote: "Love it," accompanied by clapping emojis to which Zirkzee replied: "Big man." After such a good performance, Amorim now has a selection headache ahead of the midweek trip to [Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/arsenal-fc).

  

![Image 3: Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee converse after Manchester United's victory over Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492620.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/0_Screenshot-2024-12-01-170802.jpg)

Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee exchange messages after Manchester United's victory over Everton

Both Rasmus Hojlund and Zirkzee have scored braces in their last appearances for United and will both be vying for a starting spot at the Emirates Stadium.

Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton
===========================================================================

Manchester United recorded back-to-back victories on Sunday as they beat Everton 4-0 in the Premier League at Old Trafford
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Manchester United defenders Harry Maguire and Matthijs de Ligt have sent their appreciation to Joshua Zirkzee as his brace helped the Reds to a 4-0 victory over Everton.

[United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) opened the scoring just after the half-hour mark when [Marcus Rashford's](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/marcus-rashford) deflected strike beat Jordan Pickford. Shortly before the interval, Zirkzee had his first of the afternoon firing home on the edge of the area after Amad won the ball high up the pitch.

In the second half, Rashford netted his brace and [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) followed closely afterwards with a calm finish into the bottom corner. While it was good for United to see the English striker move on to seven for the season, it was particularly pleasing to see Zirkzee find his feet.

**READ MORE: [United player ratings vs Everton](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**READ MORE: [Amorim handed huge double blow ahead of Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/ruben-amorim-handed-huge-double-30491567)**

After being signed by [Erik ten Hag](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/erik-ten-hag) and not impressing in front of goal, there had been speculation that Zirkzee could be surplus to requirements so soon into his United career. But, getting a start under Amorim and scoring twice will undoubtedly boost his confidence.

Following the match both [De Ligt](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/matthijs-de-ligt) and [Maguire](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/harry-maguire) sent messages to the striker. His Dutch teammate posted a fire emoji alongside a picture of the pair celebrating to which [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) replied with a love heart.

Meanwhile, Maguire wrote: "Love it," accompanied by clapping emojis to which Zirkzee replied: "Big man." After such a good performance, Amorim now has a selection headache ahead of the midweek trip to [Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/arsenal-fc).

  

![Image 3: Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee converse after Manchester United's victory over Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492620.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/0_Screenshot-2024-12-01-170802.jpg)

Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee exchange messages after Manchester United's victory over Everton

Both Rasmus Hojlund and Zirkzee have scored braces in their last appearances for United and will both be vying for a starting spot at the Emirates Stadium.

data: {"title":"Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton","description":"Manchester United recorded back-to-back victories on Sunday as they beat Everton 4-0 in the Premier League at Old Trafford","url":"https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/joshua-zirkzee-responds-teammates-after-30492592","content":"Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton - Manchester Evening News
===============
                                   

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton
===========================================================================

Manchester United recorded back-to-back victories on Sunday as they beat Everton 4-0 in the Premier League at Old Trafford
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

*   [Comments2](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/joshua-zirkzee-responds-teammates-after-30492592#comments-wrapper "Comments")

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Jack Flintham](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/jack-flintham/)Sport Central Audience Writer

*   17:42, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Joshua Zirkzee celebrates scoring for Manchester United vs Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492643.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187703787.jpg)

Joshua Zirkzee celebrates scoring for Manchester United vs Everton on Sunday (Image: James Gill - Danehouse/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Manchester United defenders Harry Maguire and Matthijs de Ligt have sent their appreciation to Joshua Zirkzee as his brace helped the Reds to a 4-0 victory over Everton.

[United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) opened the scoring just after the half-hour mark when [Marcus Rashford's](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/marcus-rashford) deflected strike beat Jordan Pickford. Shortly before the interval, Zirkzee had his first of the afternoon firing home on the edge of the area after Amad won the ball high up the pitch.

In the second half, Rashford netted his brace and [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) followed closely afterwards with a calm finish into the bottom corner. While it was good for United to see the English striker move on to seven for the season, it was particularly pleasing to see Zirkzee find his feet.

**READ MORE: [United player ratings vs Everton](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**READ MORE: [Amorim handed huge double blow ahead of Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/ruben-amorim-handed-huge-double-30491567)**

After being signed by [Erik ten Hag](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/erik-ten-hag) and not impressing in front of goal, there had been speculation that Zirkzee could be surplus to requirements so soon into his United career. But, getting a start under Amorim and scoring twice will undoubtedly boost his confidence.

Following the match both [De Ligt](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/matthijs-de-ligt) and [Maguire](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/harry-maguire) sent messages to the striker. His Dutch teammate posted a fire emoji alongside a picture of the pair celebrating to which [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) replied with a love heart.

Meanwhile, Maguire wrote: "Love it," accompanied by clapping emojis to which Zirkzee replied: "Big man." After such a good performance, Amorim now has a selection headache ahead of the midweek trip to [Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/arsenal-fc).

  

![Image 3: Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee converse after Manchester United's victory over Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492620.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/0_Screenshot-2024-12-01-170802.jpg)

Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee exchange messages after Manchester United's victory over Everton

Both Rasmus Hojlund and Zirkzee have scored braces in their last appearances for United and will both be vying for a starting spot at the Emirates Stadium.

data: {"title":"Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton","description":"Manchester United recorded back-to-back victories on Sunday as they beat Everton 4-0 in the Premier League at Old Trafford","url":"https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/joshua-zirkzee-responds-teammates-after-30492592","content":"Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton - Manchester Evening News
===============
                                    

 

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

Joshua Zirkzee responds to teammates after Man United redemption vs Everton
===========================================================================

Manchester United recorded back-to-back victories on Sunday as they beat Everton 4-0 in the Premier League at Old Trafford
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[men](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/)

*   Bookmark
    
*   Share
*   
*   
*   

*   [Comments2](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/joshua-zirkzee-responds-teammates-after-30492592#comments-wrapper "Comments")

[Sport](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/)

By

[Jack Flintham](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/authors/jack-flintham/)Sport Central Audience Writer

*   17:42, 1 DEC 2024

*   Bookmark
    

![Image 1: Joshua Zirkzee celebrates scoring for Manchester United vs Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492643.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-2187703787.jpg)

Joshua Zirkzee celebrates scoring for Manchester United vs Everton on Sunday (Image: James Gill - Danehouse/Getty Images)

![Image 2: Manchester Evening News logo - whatsapp community](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-branding/publications/men/img/icon-men.png)

###### Get the latest MEN breaking news on WhatsApp

Our community members are treated to special offers, promotions and adverts from us and our partners. You can check out at any time. [More info](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/privacy-notice)

[Join us on WhatsApp](https://chat.whatsapp.com/IG57qlIoDZM56XwrenyELG)

Manchester United defenders Harry Maguire and Matthijs de Ligt have sent their appreciation to Joshua Zirkzee as his brace helped the Reds to a 4-0 victory over Everton.

[United](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/manchester-united-fc) opened the scoring just after the half-hour mark when [Marcus Rashford's](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/marcus-rashford) deflected strike beat Jordan Pickford. Shortly before the interval, Zirkzee had his first of the afternoon firing home on the edge of the area after Amad won the ball high up the pitch.

In the second half, Rashford netted his brace and [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) followed closely afterwards with a calm finish into the bottom corner. While it was good for United to see the English striker move on to seven for the season, it was particularly pleasing to see Zirkzee find his feet.

**READ MORE: [United player ratings vs Everton](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/manchester-united-player-ratings-amad-30490967)**

**READ MORE: [Amorim handed huge double blow ahead of Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/ruben-amorim-handed-huge-double-30491567)**

After being signed by [Erik ten Hag](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/erik-ten-hag) and not impressing in front of goal, there had been speculation that Zirkzee could be surplus to requirements so soon into his United career. But, getting a start under Amorim and scoring twice will undoubtedly boost his confidence.

Following the match both [De Ligt](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/matthijs-de-ligt) and [Maguire](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/harry-maguire) sent messages to the striker. His Dutch teammate posted a fire emoji alongside a picture of the pair celebrating to which [Zirkzee](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/joshua-zirkzee) replied with a love heart.

Meanwhile, Maguire wrote: "Love it," accompanied by clapping emojis to which Zirkzee replied: "Big man." After such a good performance, Amorim now has a selection headache ahead of the midweek trip to [Arsenal](https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/all-about/arsenal-fc).

  

![Image 3: Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee converse after Manchester United's victory over Everton](https://i2-prod.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article30492620.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/0_Screenshot-2024-12-01-170802.jpg)

Harry Maguire and Joshua Zirkzee exchange messages after Manchester United's victory over Everton

Both Rasmus Hojlund and Zirkzee have scored braces in their last appearances for United and will both be vying for a starting spot at the Emirates Stadium.

Manchester United history is about to repeat itself with £72million player - and it's good news
===============================================================================================

Rasmus Hojlund scored a brace in the Europa League on Thursday night and he must kick on after that display.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   07:00, 30 NOV 2024

*   Bookmark
